PROJECTS_PRO_MATCH_DESC: Currently developing an MVP web app. Frontend built with Angular 18 and Tailwind CSS, backend uses Node.js, Express, and Sequelize with MySQL. Allows creating and managing futsal leagues.
PROJECTS_GUIFRE_LINK_DESC: Developed a URL shortener web app. Built with Next.js 14 and MongoDB. This first version allows creating and redirecting shortened URLs, plus click tracking.
PROJECTS_VICOBOOK_DESC: Worked on the frontend of a web app for collaborative real-time writing projects. Developed with Next.js 12 and Chakra UI, offering a fluid interface.
